scripts.update-chart: storylines compile . /tmp/story.json && NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" storylines chart /tmp/story.json /tmp/data.json /tmp/data.dot && dot -Tsvg -o /tmp/chart.svg /tmp/data.dot
scripts.view-chart: storylines compile . /tmp/story.json && NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" storylines chart /tmp/story.json /tmp/data.json /tmp/data.dot && dot -Tsvg -o /tmp/chart.svg /tmp/data.dot && xdg-open /tmp/chart.svg
